snippet: The Brooklyn TV Quilt is a new multifunctional storage unit that holds, among other things, a television.
abstract: Think Fabricate designs new multifunctional storage unit known as the Brooklyn TV Quilt.
lead_paragraph: The Brooklyn TV Quilt is a new multifunctional storage unit that holds, among other things, a television.

headline.seo: Brooklyn TV Quilt, a Multifunctional Storage Unit
